actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to eliminate the coverage gap under the Medicare part D prescription drug program.
short_title: Medicare Part D Coverage Gap Elimination Act of 2006

summary.text: Medicare Part D Coverage Gap Elimination Act of 2006 - Amends part D (Voluntary Prescription Drug Benefit Program) of title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to eliminate the coverage gap under the Medicare part D prescription drug program.

titles.title: Medicare Part D Coverage Gap Elimination Act of 2006
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to eliminate the coverage gap under the Medicare part D prescription drug program.
